original_title: Sri Lanka rupee weaker against dollar, bond yields up
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 301.85/302.00 to the US dollar in the spot market Thursday, weaker from 301.70/80 the previous day, while bond yields were up, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 15.03.2028 closed at 8.75/83 percent, from 8.75/85 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.12.2032 closed at 10.25/33 percent, up from 10.25/32 percent. (Colombo/Aug21/2025)
